name: Mine Shift
description:
You have bough an old mine... cheap. Oh no, it is in a crappy unstable state.

Are you brave enough to get to the bottom of the mine?!

BEWARE: Mine is extremely unstable. Build supports regularly. Watch out for the sand worms. Did you know that you can kill them? Restore old pumps to drain water out of the mine. Protect pipes from pumps to the tank if you don't like drowning yourself. You can also reinforce your supports. Reinforced supports are great against the sand worms and other dangers you will meet down below. Use them. Good luck!

CONTROLS: Arrow keys for movement and digging. Space key for construction.
